it.softphone.rd.gwt.client.widget
Class AnimatedContent

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
          com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite
              it.softphone.rd.gwt.client.widget.AnimatedContent
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.event.logical.shared.HasAttachHandlers, com.google.gwt.event.logical.shared.HasCloseHandlers<AnimatedContent>, com.google.gwt.event.logical.shared.HasOpenHandlers<AnimatedContent>, com.google.gwt.event.shared.HasHandlers, com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasAnimation, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasVisibility, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.IsRenderable, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.IsWidget, ResourceAware
public final class AnimatedContent
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite
implements com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasAnimation, com.google.gwt.event.logical.shared.HasOpenHandlers<AnimatedContent>, com.google.gwt.event.logical.shared.HasCloseHandlers<AnimatedContent>, ResourceAware

A widget that consists of a content panel that discloses the content.

CSS Style Rules

.gwt-DisclosurePanel
the panel's primary style
.gwt-DisclosurePanel-open
dependent style set when panel is open
.gwt-DisclosurePanel-closed
dependent style set when panel is closed

Author:
Alessandro Casolla

setContent

public void setContent(com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.IsWidget content)
Sets the content widget which can be opened and closed by this panel. If there is a preexisting content widget, it will be detached.

Parameters:
content - the widget to be used as the content panel

setOpen

public void setOpen(boolean isOpen)
Changes the visible state of this AnimatedContent.

Parameters:
isOpen - true to open the panel, false to close
